attributes.action: Absolutely no deal, wto, no £39 billion, we voted for no deal!
attributes.additional_details:
Our armed forces did not give fight 2 world wars for the politicians to throw it away, since being in the eu, our crime rate has gone up, our children are being raped and abused, we are not allowed to fly an English flag in case it offends someone! Where has the British spirit gone.
The British people have now had enough, if the no deal is not delivered the next General election is going to be very different, and a lot of politicians will be collecting their P45.
So please do the right thing.
attributes.background: Absolutely no deal, wto, no £39 billion, pull our troops out of the eu army, retain our waters for our fishermen to bring more jobs and money to our country, we voted for no deal, no customs union, no Lisbon treaty, England to make all rules once again and believe in your country.
